author: Mehdi Otmann
description: Peach and apricot with the freshness of lime and the dense sweetness of maple syrup.
name: Louisiana Trade
recipeIngredient: 60 ml Southern USA-style liqueur 40% (e.g. Southern Comfort)
7.5 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°brix)

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into glass filled with crushed ice
